resources.string:
This application relies on AICore Beta, so let's install it first:
 
 1. Join the aicore-experimental Google group
 
 2. Opt in to the Android AICore testing program
 
 3. Go for a walk. An hour later, in the Google Play store app, make sure you have "Android AICore (Beta)" installed. If the "(Beta)" suffix is not present, update your apps, reboot, and wait it a bit more.
 
 If you still get this screen, please file an issue on my GitHub issue tracker, ideally with devicean ADB logcat dump.
 
 Thank you for your patience!
